alert.note: Alert for Colbert; Lauderdale (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 1:25PM CDT until July 01 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 200 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL LAUDERDALE AND CENTRAL COLBERT COUNTIES... At 125 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of St. Florian to near Underwood- Petersville to near Cherokee, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Florence, Muscle Shoals, Sheffield, Tuscumbia, Killen, Cherokee, St. Florian, Underwood-Petersville, Green Hill and Northwest Alabama Regional Airport. HAIL...1.00IN WIND...60MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
